word: # input_telex: Gõ trực tiếp chờ auto-restore
# input_telex_revert: Gõ Telex thuần với double/triple modifier để revert (N/A nếu không cần)
# input_vni: Gõ trực tiếp chờ auto-restore
# INVALID VN INITIAL - NO REVERT NEEDED
# DOUBLE SS AT END - REVERT NEEDED

notes: ue not valid VN vowel pattern

word: # DOUBLE FF AT END - REVERT NEEDED
# DOUBLE RR AT END - REVERT NEEDED

notes: single r → vả (need varr to revert)
rr reverts → eror (need errror for error)
single r → fỏ (need forr to revert)

word: # DOUBLE SS IN MIDDLE - REVERT + FOREIGN MODE

input_telex: need triple s (sss) to get full word

notes: ss reverts → isue (need isssue for issue)

word: # DOUBLE FF IN MIDDLE - REVERT + FOREIGN MODE

input_telex: need triple f (fff) to get full word

notes: ff reverts → cofee (need cofffee for coffee)

word: # IEW PATTERN - INVALID TRIPHTHONG (NO REVERT NEEDED)

notes: r applies hỏi (parram to revert early)
r applies hỏi (serrver to revert early)
s applies sắc (usser to revert early)

word: # NO TRANSFORM (ll pattern - not VN modifier)
# AMBIGUOUS - NO TRANSFORM (Both VN and EN valid)
